QueryText: CONTROL OF RHIZOME ROT IN GINGER
KCCAns:
Recommended for Cultural practices such as selection of well drained soils for planting is important for managing the disease, since stagnation of water predisposes the plant to infection.Seed rhizomes are to be selected from disease free gardens, since the disease is also seed borne. 
Application of Trichoderma harzionum along with neem cake @ 1kg/bed helps in preventing the disease
